abusing democratic freedoms to
infringe on interests.  of the state, the

Tran Van Si took advantage of

on air.  cyberspace statements with cover

information in cyberspace about personal secrets,
family secrets and private life of the
table Phuong Hang, Director of the Joint Stock Company  As for
Dai Nam and Mr. Quy Dung, Ms. Hang's husband,
contrary to the law, the
jury sentenced defendant Dang Thi Ni to
18 months in prison and defendant Tran Van Si to 2 years in prison
for the crime of abusing civil liberties.  The
jury also recognized many
extenuating circumstances for the two defendants, such as having
many achievements in the
investigation process and admitting to committing crimes.

Ladies and gentlemen, this morning on the
Vinh Hao Phan Thiet highway, passing through
Ham Thuan Bac district, Binh Thuan province,
a series of accidents occurred between three
trucks and a tractor-trailer, causing one
driver to commit suicide.
After about 2 hours, the tractor-trailer driven by driver
Nguyen Hong Dan, 37 years old, was driving
on the highway in the North-South direction when passing through
Hong Liem commune, Ham Thuan district.
Then he also slowed down and
waited, suddenly a truck driving in the same
direction pushed him hard, slid up and crashed into the
tractor-trailer. At the same time,
another truck driven by driver Nguyen Ngoc Y, 41 years old,
continued to crash, resulting in a collision.  There was a
series of accidents that caused driver Ngoc Y to commit
suicide on the spot. The passenger was injured and was taken to the emergency
room. The accident also caused the
traffic route of Vinh Hao Phan.  Binh
Than province police were dispatched to
